description.body: Wild Rift Patch Notes 6.0
Our inaugural letter discussing the past year on Wild Rift, and looking forward to 2025.
You better oil all those hinges and fix those screws, because once #Rumble hits on January 9th UTC there’ll be no stopping him!
A few balance changes for the last patch of 2024
New patch, new you? How about a new way of life?! David, John, and Ke show you the journey to YORDLE UP your life with patch 6.0! Coming to you on January 9th UTC. #LETSYORDLE
The progress of the arcane is inevitable. Become part of it on December 12th UTC!
Experience a reworked Singed and the new Showdown mode in Wild Rift Patch 5.3c.
How we’re celebrating Arcane Season 2 in Wild Rift.
Uncage the true wrath of Zaun with Warwick's new rework! Hitting the Rift on November 21st UTC!
How are we feeling after the Arcane Season 2 premiere? But there is no time to rest because we have a brand new game mode for you!
The age of Merdada is upon us. Bow to the warlord or get swept under her power on November 7th UTC!
Look out! A Warlord behind you!
You can take the Yordle out of Piltover, but you can’t take the progress out of the Yordle!
Heimerdinger has arrived!
It might not be rocket science, but we think  it’s smart to cover all your bases before the professor's arrival on October 17th UTC!

Final patch of the season means final season of Arcane and final chance to celebrate! David, John, and some special guests take you along for the Ultimate Arc in patch 5.3! Coming to you on October 17th UTC.
Look out, Kayle is back and better than ever!
Who better to support your team in all endeavors than a new friend with friendly fire?! Coming to you on September 20th UTC!
Defending the balance of the mortal realm has never looked this good!
Sharpen your claws and jump into action!
Be ready to join the dark side or get swallowed whole!
He might be twice slain, but this warlord is sure to pay it back tenfold starting August 23rd UTC!
The Iron Revenant has arrived!
How is it still chilly in here? Who's leaving these ice shards around?
Sit back and reflect with us on patch 5.1
Join us for an outlook on what more hexciting things to expect and celebrate this year! #HexRift

title: The Hexolution is coming to Wild Rift!

description.body: Get even wilder with the new Rift. Coming to you on July 18th UTC! #HexRift
New Rift, New champion, New skins, New items. Whatever you’re looking for, we got it with patch 5.2!
Keep your cool in every battle with this ice queen! Freezing your way on July 18th UTC!
It’s innovation season! Fresh out of Piltover’s forges, David and John present patch 5.2: Hex Rift. July 18th, put your goggles on and be ready for a Rift and creatures you’ve never seen before!
We are in the homerun of patch 5.1 now! Let’s see what we have in store for you.
We don’t want you tripping all over your roots on June 14th UTC. So, WATCH THIS #ThroughTheMist
Look out Maokai saplings incoming!
Spoiler alert we are shipping not one, but two champion reworks this patch! Tune in and check it out.
This former king won’t stop until everybody shares his pain. Starting with the Rift on May 8th UTC! #ThroughTheMist
Never has ink been more powerful. Bask in the full beauty of Calligraphia! #StrokeofFortune
Patch 5.1 takes you #ThroughTheMist, in and out of game! Laura, Paul, and Anthony are here to guide you and lift the mist on this immersive patch!
Come one come all, It’s Viego time.
Immerse yourself in the beautiful world of Calligraphia with us.

title: An Update on Wild Rift Esports in APAC

description.body: Changes coming to the WRL.
Moments before reaching the Blessed Isles, Kalista’s fate is written in the mist. Be there on April 11th when it lifts! #ThroughTheMist
Join Kalista and sail into Patch Notes 5.1!
This wraith’s wrath knows no end. Kalista’s here to get her vengeance on April 11th UTC!

The forecast is foggy for Patch 5.1: Beyond Ruination! David, John, and a special guest are introducing a mystical new patch with new champions, new game modes, and a whole lotta lore! Travel through the mist with us on April 11th!
The end is coming. And it’s got two faces! Be ready for Lamb and Wolf on March 29th UTC!
Welcome to Patch 5.0c!
The Poros are setting the mood! Don’t miss out and celebrate with them under the crescent moon starting March 8th!
Double down on the celebrations under the crescent moon! Our newest mode Double Cast will take you and your buddies to new battle heights!
Champion changes, item changes, new events, we got it all!
Can you hear the whetstone? Talon is sharpening those daggers for February 23rd UTC!
The arrival of the Dragon is a cause for big celebrations all over the world. We don’t want to miss the chance to mark this occasion with plenty of goodies on the Rift!

When all hope seems lost, sometimes all you need is a little spark to ignite that Dragonfire…
Join Zeri and Aatrox in our event and experience the entire fire-fueled Dragon Lantern saga!
The Year of the Dragon gave us the perfect occasion to marry cultural significance with some awesome designs for our Dragon Lantern Skin. Here’s a little sneak peek at what that process looked like!
February will be a big month for us, and likewise, we got a big patch for you!
Bundle up for the first Wild Rift News of the year!
Come and bask in the full glory of our Lunar Revel champs. And log in today to learn how to get your hands on that majestic Lunar Guardian Aurelion Sol!
She might’ve been asleep, but that hasn’t dampened the dark powers Syndra will start wielding come January 18th!

First new patch of the year and it’s gonna be a big one! Hold on to your hats because we got new items, a new champion, new skins, and a TON of gameplay updates. 

Welcome to the first patch of the year, Patch 5.0!
Don’t be starstruck, he’s just the dragon from down the cosmos. Come and admire Aurelion Sol’s reworked powers on January 18th UTC!

title: Dev Update: One Runeterra & Arcane Season 2

description.body: As the new year’s kicking off we want to share some of the exciting things coming your way. Join Andrei “Meddler” van Roon, Head of League Studio, for our Wild Rift 2024 outlook on the League ecosystem, Arcane Season 2, and other news!
Set your alarms for the rise of Syndra! Channel the power of darkness on January 18th UTC.

Take flight for Patch 5.0: Bright Heights! David and John are ringing in the new year with brand new champions, new game modes, and maybe possibly even a dragon or two?! Look up, up, and beyond with the new patch on January 18th!
Last patch of the year, are you ready?! We got a Ziggs rework coming your way, plus new skins, new event, and of course, your regularly scheduled balance updates.
Thorns and vines are taking over the Rift. Come and get your botanical fix on December 22th UTC!
This patch is a doozy! Welcome to the first patch of December.
No one commands the desert like this battle mistress. Experience her prowess in the Rift starting November 24th.
Did you miss us? We missed you! Wild Rift News is back for November and we have tons to share with you!
Make your fortune in the Rift with our newest warrior. Set your bounty on November 24th UTC!
This patch we are sprinting onto the Rift with Sivir! Lots of balance updates coming your way as well. Strap in and welcome to Patch 4.4b!
Two is better than one! Win the ultimate battle bonanza by teaming up with your buddy NOW!
Raise your hand if you’ve been asking for a certain new item to be looked at! We hear ya. This patch has the champions and items updates you’ve been looking for.
Celebrate another year of Wild Rift with daily in-game rewards.
BOO! This patch is full of surprises! Fiddlesticks arrives on the Rift, we’re celebrating our third-year anniversary, the mage update is here, and much more! Welcome to Patch 4.4!
This stick figure comes straight out of your worst nightmare to haunt the Rift on October 25th UTC.
It’s the last patch of the Fighting Spirit Update! We’ve got a rework to Janna, balance updates, and new skins! Welcome to Patch 4.3d!
